scripts.test: nyc --reporter=lcov --reporter=text --reporter=text-summary cross-env AFRICAFORYOU_NODE_ENV=test mocha -c -r esm test/**/*.test.js --timeout 12000 --exit
scripts.pretest: cross-env AFRICAFORYOU_NODE_ENV=test npm run migrate:reset && cross-env AFRICAFORYOU_NODE_ENV=test npm run migrate up
